chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 is having the following problem:
Dpd says package delivered but it has not been.
Thank you for your help,

Hi there,

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID.

Please send us a Proof of Delivery (POD) with the customer's signature, a photo of the package being handed to the customer, or a screenshot showing the GPS location of the delivery, within 2 business days. 

Please note: any other POD will not be considered relevant (ie: unsigned document or unclear photo).

- If a POD is provided, a police report will be required from the customer to process the claim. 

- If no POD is provided within 2 business days: only ID + Certificate of Non-receipt.

If the package is lost and the customer has provided all the necessary paperwork they can choose between a refund or a reshipment. In this case, we recommend that you block the device, if possible.

Looking forward to hearing from you,

Faratiana, 
Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have informed our logistics partner regarding the issue. in the meantime, please request a handwritten CND with IMEI from the customer, as well as his ID.

Reagrds,
JH

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the POD in this message. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hi there,

We have asked the customer to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID.

A police report will be required from the customer to process the claim.

Sincerly,

Faratiana,
Back Market Customer Care
